description: 学习名词单复数的基本规则：一般情况加-s

basic_rules: 一般情况加-s：book → books, pen → pens
这是最常见的复数变化规则
usage_tips: 记住：一个名词加-s变成多个
复数名词通常与复数动词搭配
数量词后通常用复数名词
common_errors: I have three book. (错误) → I have three books. (正确)
The cat are sleeping. (错误) → The cats are sleeping. (正确)

sentences: I have one book. → I have three books.
The cat is sleeping. → The cats are sleeping.
This is a pen. → These are pens.
I see a dog. → I see many dogs.

templates.question: There are many _____ in the garden.

learning_objectives: 掌握名词单复数的基本规则：加-s
能够将单数名词变为复数
了解复数名词的基本用法

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用基本复数规则，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握复数规则，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解复数基本规则，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对复数规则不熟悉，需要重新学习
